content.question: What does Mr. Kobayashi indicate about the students at his school?

choices.label: Many of them want to become scientists or engineers.
All of them attended the symposium held the previous month.
They requested that Ms. Yamashita visit again this year.
They complained that it was hard to understand Ms. Yamashita sometimes.

content.answer: Many of them want to become scientists or engineers.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
